channel.title: In game Teleportation problems
channel.description: Well i am using A pimpscape source, and on it you dont need runes to teleport, so when i teleport, it goes to where you want to go (eg: varrock) and when you get there, your small and have your arms out, and cannot move, the only way to go back to normal is to log out and log back on. any suggestions?

item.title: In game Teleportation problems
item.dc:creator: @Songoty Songoty
item.description:
@Songoty wrote:

Well i am using A pimpscape source, and on it you dont need runes to teleport, so when i teleport, it goes to where you want to go (eg: varrock) and when you get there, your small and have your arms out, and cannot move, the only way to go back to normal is to log out and log back on.
any suggestions?
